title: The Never Girls Collection #1
description: In a blink of an eye, the wishes of four best friends come trueNthey're whisked off to Never Land, home to Tinker Bell and her fairy friends. This attractive box contains the first four Never Girls adventures: "In a Blink, The Space Between, A Dandelion Wish, " and "From the Mist." Illustrations.
author: Kiki Thorpe
